about_the_game:
The Top is a simple precision platformer about climbing a mountain.

Demo Features:

  • Demo contains only the short tutorial section from the beginning of the game.
  • A simple narrative that runs as deep as you're willing to follow it.
  • Visual style based off the color palette of the original GameBoy.
  • An original ambient chiptune soundtrack written to accompany the game and its story.
  • Secrets.

name: The Top Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX 4100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4830 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (You can probably run this game)

short_description: The Top is a simple precision platformer about climbing a mountain.
